results.title: In ‘Succession,’ the Very Rich Are Very, Very Different
results.abstract: The HBO drama, which ends on Sunday, updates past rich-people soaps like “Dallas.” But unlike those series, it argues that the problems of the hyper-wealthy inevitably become ours too.
